Faqrecord.question: How do I choose the right teacher?
Faqrecord.answer: You can read each teacher’s profile and description, and watch their introduction video. If you are unsure which teacher would be the best fit, you can contact us for a consultation. We will recommend the teacher who best matches your goals and requirements.

Faqrecord.question: Why all the teachers rates are $28 or more?
Faqrecord.answer: We believe that $28 is the minimum fair fee at which teachers can provide appropriate services to students...
